main event: 9 or 10 dimly flowing lights were observed moving in a straight and level course for 9 to 30 seconds on May 8, 1955.
interesting points: The sighting involved multiple dimly glowing lights., The lights moved in a straight and level course., The observation lasted between 9 to 30 seconds., The conclusion of the sighting was listed as 'Unknown.', Weather conditions at the time were noted as sunny and clear.
